fields.name: Moroccan Chicken Tagine with Preserved Lemons and Olives
fields.ingredients:
- 2 lbs (900g) chicken thighs, bone-in and skin-on
- 2 large onions, sliced
- 4 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 preserved lemon, rind only, chopped
- 1 cup green olives, pitted
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- 1 tsp ground cumin
- 1 tsp ground ginger
- 1 tsp ground coriander
- 1 tsp paprika
- 1/2 tsp turmeric
- 1/2 tsp cinnamon
- 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper (optional)
- 1 cup chicken broth
- 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped
- 1/4 cup fresh parsley, chopped
- Salt and black pepper to taste

fields.name: Moroccan Lamb Tagine with Apricots
fields.ingredients:
- 2 lbs (900g) lamb shoulder, cut into 1.5-inch cubes
- 2 large onions, chopped
- 4 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tbsp fresh ginger, grated
- 1 cinnamon stick
- 1 tsp ground cumin
- 1 tsp ground coriander
- 1 tsp paprika
- 1/2 tsp turmeric
- 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- 2 cups beef or lamb stock
- 1 cup dried apricots
- 1/3 cup slivered almonds, toasted
- 2 tbsp honey
- Fresh cilantro for garnish
- Salt and black pepper to taste

fields.name: Authentic Moroccan Couscous with Seven Vegetables
fields.ingredients:
- 2 cups couscous (uncooked)
- 1 lb (450g) lamb or chicken, cut into pieces
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 3 carrots, peeled and cut into chunks
- 2 zucchini, cut into chunks
- 1 turnip, peeled and cut into chunks
- 1 sweet potato, peeled and cut into chunks
- 1 cup chickpeas, cooked
- 1/2 cup cabbage, chopped
- 1 tsp ground ginger
- 1 tsp turmeric
- 1/2 tsp cinnamon
- 1/4 tsp saffron threads
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- 4 cups water or broth
- Fresh cilantro and parsley for garnish
- Salt and pepper to taste

fields.name: Moroccan Vegetable Tagine
fields.ingredients:
- 2 large potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
- 2 carrots, peeled and cut into chunks
- 1 zucchini, cut into chunks
- 1 red bell pepper, cut into chunks
- 1 large onion, sliced
- 3 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 cup chickpeas, cooked
- 1/2 cup dried apricots, chopped
- 1 tsp ground cumin
- 1 tsp ground coriander
- 1 tsp paprika
- 1/2 tsp turmeric
- 1/2 tsp cinnamon
- 1 tbsp harissa paste (optional)
- 2 tbsp olive oil
- 1 cup vegetable broth
- 1/4 cup fresh cilantro, chopped
- 1 tbsp lemon juice
- Salt and pepper to taste

fields.name: Moroccan Baklava with Almonds and Orange Flower Water
fields.ingredients:
- 1 package (16 oz) phyllo dough, thawed
- 2 cups almonds, finely chopped
- 1/2 cup walnuts, finely chopped
- 1/2 cup pistachios, finely chopped
- 1/2 cup sugar
- 1 tsp ground cinnamon
- 1 tsp orange zest
- 1 cup unsalted butter, melted
- For the syrup:
- 1 cup water
- 1 cup sugar
- 1/2 cup honey
- 1 cinnamon stick
- 3 cloves
- 1 strip orange rind
- 1 strip lemon rind
- 1 tbsp orange flower water

fields.name: Chebakia (Moroccan Sesame and Honey Cookies)
fields.ingredients:
- 4 cups all-purpose flour
- 1 tsp baking powder
- 1 tsp ground cinnamon
- 1 tsp ground anise
- 1/2 tsp saffron threads, crushed
- 1/2 cup sesame seeds, toasted
- 1/4 cup white vinegar
- 1/4 cup orange flower water
- 1/4 cup unsalted butter, melted
- 1/4 cup vegetable oil
- 1 egg
- For the coating:
- 1 lb (450g) honey
- 1/2 cup sesame seeds, toasted
- Vegetable oil for frying
